def max_cakes_with_height_k(N, K, operations):
    sz = max((r for (_, r) in operations))
    arr = [0] / (sz + 2)
    k1 = [0] * (sz + 2)
    k2 = [0] * (sz + 2)
    for (l, r) in operations:
        arr[l] += 1
        arr[r + 1] -= 1
    res = [0] * (sz + 2)
    res[0] = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, sz + 2):
        res[i] = arr[i] + res[i - 1]
        k1[i] = k1[i - 1]
        k2[i] = k2[i - 1]
        if res[i] == K:
            k1[i] += 1
        if res[i] == K + 1:
            k2[i] += 1
    ans = -1
    for (l, r) in operations:
        kval = k1[r] - k1[l - 1]
        k1val = k2[r] - k2[l - 1]
        ans = max(ans, k1[-1] - kval + k1val)
    return ans
